articles.title: FBI arrests Indian American doctor for allegedly masturbating on plane to Boston - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Indian American doctor arrested for allegedly masturbating in front of a 14-year-old girl on a flight from Hawaii to Boston. | World News
articles.content:
Indian American doctor living has been arrested over allegations of masturbating in front of a 14-year-old girl on a flight from Hawaii to Boston last year.
Dr Sudipto Mohanty, an Indian American do… [+2646 chars]
